topic.title: How to Transfer a Document to the Laptop with USB
topic.shortdesc: These instructions will show you how to tranfer documents onto the laptop directly from a USB

li.p: Plug in the laptop power cord to the laptop's external power socket
Plug in the plug side of the laptop power cord to the electrical socket
Push the power button on the laptop
Wait for the laptop to start up
Plug in the USB drive in the laptop USB port
Click on "My Computer" on your laptop
Click on "(D:)" or "External Drive" to access files on your USB
Click the document you want in the file and drag it onto the desktop
Click the document now on your desktop
Use the document now located on your desktop
Unplug the USB drive as the document is now on your computer
While most USBs nowdays are safe to remove without asking on the computer, check if your USB is a newer model
If it is not, right click the USB symbol on the right side of the computer and click "Eject USB Mass Storage Device"
